name: Robot Break Room escape
description:
Made for Indie Game Dev Beginners #003
Hosted by nerdifex

Can you manage to complete the four levels without having to restart the level?
If you do something in the wrong order you can always restart the level.


Controls are A&D for movement, or arrow keys.
Spacebar for using ability.
C to change Character.
R to restart level.




This is my first game ever, so be prepared to encounter one or two odd buggs.
Assets used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-062022-225623
Tilemap art is from: https://www.kenney.nl/
